categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Fatimah Nurii was a female from Commenor that served in the Galactic Empire. She attended the Imperial Navy Academy on Prefsbelt IV and was attached to the Imperial Navy's Military Police garrison on Scarif and was a no-nonsense officer, serving as a captain and shore patrol officer. Originally, however, Nurii sought to become a litigator in the office of the Navy's barrister advocate.
